name: onomatopoeic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a word) sounding similar to the noise the word refers to: "Pop", "boom", and "squelch" are onomatopoeic words. The word "click" is onomatopoeic in itself. See
onomatopoeia
More examplesFewer examplesEnglish is a very onomatopoeic language and perfectly suited to poetry.Cuckoo and chiffchaff are perhaps the best known examples of onomatopoeic bird names.He commented on the poet's onomatopoeic use of language.
